snippet: Humor apps for the smartphone offer everything from lowbrow sight gags to wickedly biting comic strips.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column examines series of humorous mobile applications, from those that utilize sight gags to witty comic strips.
lead_paragraph: Humor apps for the smartphone offer everything from lowbrow sight gags to wickedly biting comic strips.

headline.print_headline: Just for Laughs: Fake Mustaches and Cat Translations
headline.main: Just for Laughs: Fake Mustaches and Cat Translations
